title: Mercedes-Benz drives forward electrification plan with new 2030 target
lead: German auto giant confirms plans for a 'profound reallocation of capital' as it announces it is to invest £34bn and build eight gigafactories in support of its EV strategy ...

title: Generate Capital gets $2bn boost for 'sustainable infrastructure' projects
lead: Green infrastructure-as-a-service specialist secures major cash injection ...

title: Good Energy 'unequivocally' rebuffs fourth takeover bid from rival Ecotricity
lead: Long-running battle between West Country rivals sees Ecotricity table bid valuing Good Energy at almost £60m ...

title: COP26: Mayors and unions pledge to deliver 'decade of action', as calls grow for bolder climate goals
lead: City leaders from around the world commit to 'just transition', as protesters criticise pace of UK climate action  ...

title: Make My Money Matter urges UK's 81 largest occupational pension schemes to target net zero
lead: Green pensions campaign calls on defined benefit schemes of a number of major emitters including BP, ExxonMobil, Shell and British Airways to set net zero goals ...

title: Asda to switch entire fleet of 600 company cars to electric
lead: Following feedback from staff on its company car offering, the supermarket said it would ensure only electric vehicles are leased to employees by 2025 ...

title: All aboard: Chiltern Railways prepares UK's first battery-diesel train for full service
lead: Hybrid train to begin operating full passenger service in September in a bid to offer greener and quieter journeys ...

title: Team GB join Olympian battle against plastic waste
lead: Environment Agency is encouraging Britain's Olympic athletes to sign up to the 'Big Plastic Pledge' via a flyer in their official Tokyo 2020 kit bags ...

title: Climate Calculator: Online tool launched to give UK public their say on how to reach net zero
lead: Online tool asks public for their views on the best path to net zero emissions touching on food, energy, heating and manufacturing among other areas ...

title: Surging waste crime costing UK economy £1bn, businesses warn
lead: Environmental Services Association research suggest waste-related crime has surged over 50 per cent in three years, potentially costing taxpayers £1bn ...

title: BP snaps up Open Energi in bid to 'rapidly grow' flexible grid market
lead: Oil and gas giant says flexible grid services have critical role to play in supporting global renewables rollout ...

title: Green Gas Levy: Tariff scheme to fund biomethane plants set for autumn launch
lead: Government confirms plans for levy on gas suppliers to help fund grid-connected anaerobic digestion (AD) plants around Britain ...

title: Waitrose and Shell join forces to power up EV charging coverage
lead: Supermarket to offer 800 charging points to customers with electric vehicles by 2025 as part of new partnership with Shell ...

title: Ecosia to dedicate green search revenues to wildfire recovery
lead: Green search engine announces it is to invest revenues in forest restoration projects in Brazil, USA, and Australia  ...

title: Octopus Renewables snaps up independent distribution network operator Eclipse
lead: Clean energy investor cements presence in energy networks sector two years after its first investment in Eclipse ...

title: Glasgow joins Thriving Cities Initiative as it marks 100 day countdown to COP26
lead: COP26 host to join select group of cities that have agreed to pilot ways to deliver a just transition for local communities  ...

title: 'Woefully inadequate': Report warns global oil and gas industry set to thwart chances of a 1.5C world
lead: World Benchmarking Alliance warns that the global oil and gas industry is on track to smash through the carbon budgets that would prevent global average temperature increases spiralling above 1.5C ...

title: UK carbon capture sector eyes £41bn investment by 2030
lead: Trade body CCSA urges sector to seize opportunity to build up domestic supply chain in support of growing CCUS pipeline ...

title: Study: Electric cars undercut petrol and diesel on total cost of ownership
lead: New LV= Electric Car Cost Index calculates that EVs can deliver cost savings compared to their internal combustion engine counterparts ...

title: ENGIE debuts new EQUANS services brand for a 'greener, more efficient and increasingly digital world'
lead: New €12bn technical services provider promises to support roll out of smart buildings, green mobility, district and embedded energy, and decentralised renewables projects ...

title: Rothesay and Railpen commit to 2050 net zero targets
lead: Insurer and Railways Pension Scheme manager also set interim targets for nearer-term cuts ...

title: Top firms sign up to Make My Money Matter Green Pensions Charter
lead: Tesco and Travis Perkins among 11 new signatories to high profile sustainable pensions campaign ...

title: Liz Truss: Reject 'green protectionism' in favour of free trade to drive net zero
lead: International Trade Secretary backs report by Board of Trade which highlights huge UK opportunities from green exports, but campaigners fear opposition to carbon border tariffs could undermine global decarbonisation efforts ...

title: Drink responsibly: Net zero accreditation scheme launched for pubs and bars
lead: Pilot project featuring three dozen pubs and bars reveals that venues that service food face steeper decarbonisation challenge than 'wet-led' venues ...

title: Report: Food waste crisis worse than thought, as farm waste tops one billion tonnes
lead: Major new study from WWF argues previous food waste data is based on a major underestimate, thanks to huge amounts of food lost before it leaves the farm ...

title: Sustainability officer tops list of jobs generating most buzz online
lead: Renewables engineer and corporate sustainability officer revealed to be among the 10 most discussed jobs online, according to new analysis from Open University  ...

title: Booming UK renewables industry still at risk of missing net zero targets
lead: Annual state of the industry report from REA reveals a sector that is continuing to expand, but remains hampered by 'policy gaps' ...

title: Construction industry publishes sweeping net zero blueprint
lead: New 'Performance Framework' includes fresh goals to slash the use of diesel equipment, drastically improve building energy efficiency, and help enable transport decarbonisation ...

title: John Kerry: 'We don't have the luxury of waiting until Covid is vanquished to take up the climate challenge'
lead: US Climate Envoy issues clarion call for governments to step up diplomatic push in the run up to the COP26 Climate Summit ...

title: Government launches £375m 'breakthrough' fund to scale cutting-edge technologies
lead: Fund opens to applications from R&D intensive companies with well-established UK operations, including those looking to scale up net zero technologies, Ministers confirm ...

title: 'We need to act fast': Wind energy CEOs urge G20 to acclerate turbine rollout
lead: Global climate goals at risk without more ambitious support for wind power from G20 countries, CEOs warn ...

title: Pivot Power partners with Wärtsilä to launch energy superhub model in the West Midlands
lead: Hubs that combine EV charging with grid-scale battery storage will enable regions across the UK achieve climate and clean air pledges, according to Pivot Power ...

title: Aviva launches Climate Transition Real Assets Fund
lead: Asset manager aims to open up defined contribution schemes for assets that aid the net zero transition ...

title: UK food and drinks sector unveils fresh waste, water, and carbon goals for 2030
lead: Voluntary Courtauld Commitment ramps up collective industry targets 'to meet newer demands of climate action head on' in run up to COP26 ...

title: 'Take control': Ofgem and BEIS unveil energy digitalisation and smart technologies strategies
lead: Government and regulator sketch out their plans for net zero power system through package of new strategies, consultations, and calls for evidence  ...

title: Highways England maps out route for net zero roads by 2050
lead: Government company's plan includes requirements for contractors that it argues could make road maintenance and construction 'near zero' emission by 2040 ...

title: 'Exciting but challenging': Britain's glass industry unveils 2050 net zero vision
lead: British Glass sets out potential decarbonisation pathways based on renewables, hydrogen, CCS, and greater recycling levels ...

title: Survey: UK public favours stronger policies to combat nature crisis
lead: UK adults believe neither governments nor businesses are doing enough to protect and enhance natural world, according to a new poll from WSP and Bright Blue ...

title: General Electric pledges to achieve net zero across the products its sells
lead: Producer of jet engines and thermal power plant turbines argues that the engineering challenges it must solve to reach net zero emissions represent 'strategic opportunities' for the company ...
